description:
Windows 8 is the latest Operating System introduced by Microsoft.Many new features and functionality are introduced in windows 8 such as Metro user interface,parental controls,easy and fast System recovery and a new lock screen with a clock and notification.Windows 8 have file Explorer and ribbon to provide better and faster control to the users.

Why You need to learn Windows 8?

Windows 8 is totally different from Microsoft's earlier Operating system such as Windows Xp,Windows vista and Windows 7.

Many new features and funtionality are introduced with windows 8.Without knowing these new features and functionality you will not be able to take the full advantage of windows 8.

In this course you will learn from very basic How to Switch Between Metro UI and Desktop Mode to how to protect your System from hackers and virus using Windows 8 Pre-installed software.This course also help you to customized your windows 8 as your need.

You will also learn how to install apps from apps store safely and easily.

In this course you will learn to protect your Privacy along with important tips and tricks required to be a super windows 8 User.
title: Windows 8 For Absolute Beginner
